text: Nimurwanire idini ry’Imana nkuko yabitegetse kuko ariyo yabatoye, kandi ntiyabashiriye hejuru yanyu ibintu biremereye mw’idini ikaba ariyo migenzo ya so wanyu Ibrahimu (iii) ariwe yabahaye izina rya Isilamu kuva kera na rindi, no muri ibi kandi mwiswe kuri iryo zina kugira ngo intumwa y’Imana ibabere icabona kuri mwebwe, namwe mube ivyabona kubantu bose, rero nimu hagarike amasengesho yanyu hamwe nugutanga imperezwa muteko mufatane munda kubera Imana yanyu, kuko niwe Muremyi wanyu, Umuremyi w’intungane ameze gute kandi umufasha mwiza ameze gute
